sect1.title: ToolChain Variables
sect1.para: The following variables are required to be set for the uClibc build. After the uClibc build they will be removed again until they are reset for the final-system.

screen.userinput: export CC="${CLFS_TARGET}-gcc" export CXX="${CLFS_TARGET}-g++" export AR="${CLFS_TARGET}-ar" export AS="${CLFS_TARGET}-as" export LD="${CLFS_TARGET}-ld" export RANLIB="${CLFS_TARGET}-ranlib" export STRIP="${CLFS_TARGET}-strip"
